# https://docs.claimmosaic.com llms.txt

- [Claim Mosaic Documentation](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/): Comprehensive guide for public adjusters using Claim Mosaic.
- [ClaimMosaic Sitemap](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/sitemap-index.xml): Comprehensive sitemap for ClaimMosaic documentation and resources.
- [Claims Files Management](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/claims/claim-detail/files-tab/): Central hub for managing claim-related documents and files.
- [Insurance Policy Management](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/claims/claim-detail/insurance-tab/): Manage insurance policy details and company information effectively.
- [Claim Detail View](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/claims/claim-detail/): Detailed overview and management of individual insurance claims.
- [Claim Overview Details](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/claims/claim-detail/overview-tab/): Essential overview of claims with detailed information and tools.
- [Claims Contacts Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/claims/claim-detail/contacts-tab/): Centralized contacts for claims management and communication.
- [Claim Accounting Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/claims/claim-detail/accounting-tab/): Detailed overview of claim finances with invoice generation features.
- [Claims and Management Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/sitemap-0.xml): Comprehensive guide covering claims, companies, contacts, dashboards, and settings.
- [Claim Activity Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/claims/claim-detail/activity-tab/): Track every action related to claims in one tab.
- [Claim Tasks Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/claims/claim-detail/tasks-tab/): Manage claim-related tasks efficiently for organized workflow.
- [Claims Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/claims/claims-list/): Comprehensive claims management with search and filter options.
- [Claims Management Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/claims/overview/): Central hub for managing and tracking claims efficiently.
- [Company Directory](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/companies/): Comprehensive directory of companies and services offered.
- [Managing Companies Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/companies/managing-companies/): Manage company records with detailed views and filtering options.
- [Companies Directory Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/companies/overview/): Centralized directory for managing organizations in claims process.
- [Claim Mosaic Contacts](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/contacts/): Find contact information for Claim Mosaic support and inquiries.
- [Contact Management System](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/contacts/managing-contacts/): Manage and categorize your network of contacts efficiently.
- [Contacts Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/contacts/overview/): Central directory for managing all customer interactions seamlessly.
- [User Activities Feed](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/dashboard/activities/): Chronological log of user activities and updates found here.
- [Admin Dashboard Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/dashboard/admin-dashboard/): Centralized user activity monitoring and reporting dashboard.
- [Quick Add Feature](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/dashboard/quick-add/): Easily create new records without page navigation.
- [User Dashboard](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/dashboard/user-dashboard/): Overview of tasks, claims, and leads for users.
- [Claim Mosaic Setup](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/getting-started/account-setup/): Essential steps for setting up your Claim Mosaic account.
- [Account Setup FAQ](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/getting-started/faq/): Find answers to account setup and management questions.
- [Tiers and Pricing](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/getting-started/tiers-pricing/): Explore Claim Mosaic's subscription tiers and pricing options.
- [Example Guide](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/guides/example/): Step-by-step guide for accomplishing specific tasks effectively.
- [Lead to Claim Process](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/leads/converting-to-claim/): Convert leads into claims easily with automated options.
- [Lead Detail Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/leads/lead-detail-page/): Comprehensive overview of a single lead and related tasks.
- [Lead Management Tools](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/leads/managing-leads/): Manage your leads efficiently with search, filters, and actions.
- [Leads Management Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/leads/overview/): Manage potential clients and claims efficiently in one place.
- [Calendar Task Management](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/mosaic-view/calendar/): Manage tasks and due dates with a monthly calendar view.
- [Claim Management Board](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/mosaic-view/claim-board/): Visual interface for managing claims with drag-and-drop functionality.
- [Lead Board](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/mosaic-view/lead-board/): Manage leads visually using a Kanban-style interface.
- [Claims Map View](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/mosaic-view/map-view/): Interactive map view for claims management and field inspections.
- [Task Board Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/mosaic-view/task-board/): Visualize and prioritize tasks by due date effectively.
- [Example Reference](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/reference/example/): Comprehensive outline of reference documentation and usage.
- [ClaimMosaic Reports](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/reports/): Access various report types for ClaimMosaic insights.
- [Report Creation Guide](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/reports/creating-reports/): Easily create and customize reports with detailed steps.
- [Reports Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/reports/overview/): Generate customized reports using stored data efficiently.
- [User Access Management](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/settings/access-rights/): Manage user roles and permissions for system access.
- [Claim Automation Settings](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/settings/automation/): Automate claim processes and set intelligent defaults effectively.
- [Billing Management](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/settings/billing/): Manage subscription, user licenses, and eSignature usage effectively.
- [Document Templates](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/settings/document-templates/): Manage and create document templates for claim documentation.
- [External Portal Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/settings/external-portals/): Manage external stakeholders' access to claim details securely.
- [Manage Data Fields](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/settings/fields/): Customizable fields for managing claims, leads, and contacts efficiently.
- [General Settings](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/settings/general/): Manage company identity, logo, and essential information settings.
- [Invoice Configuration](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/settings/invoicing/): Configure default invoice settings for consistent billing practices.
- [User Management](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/settings/users/): Manage and configure user accounts effectively within the system.
- [Task Management Guide](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/tasks/): Comprehensive guide on managing tasks within Claim Mosaic.
- [Task Management Overview](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/tasks/managing-tasks/): Efficiently manage and track tasks for your team.
- [Tasks Overview Dashboard](https://docs.claimmosaic.com/tasks/overview/): Centralized tasks dashboard for claims and leads management.
